HELLO THERE! 

We the people of the Makai Islands need your HELP!

A crazed and powerful wizard named Oka Hewa has captured the Head Protector of the islands and cursed all of his fellow Protectors and turned them into dangerous allies via a spell. 

Luckily Kiki the Bird has warned most of the Islands about the situation but was sadly captured. Free Kiki and meet the inhabitants of all the Island and put an end to the Rule of Oka Hewa!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INFO ABOUT THE GAME

  • You go across different islands by completing missions provided by the inhabitants. When one of them are finished you'll recieve a map piece. 
  • You can make use of 2 characters, named : Mairobi and Kiki each having their own set of missions and skills.
  • Look around the amazing scenery and unique storytelling with original music
  • You need to battle with all the Cursed Protectors so you can lift their curse and help you in your journey
  • After beating a Cursed Protector you'll get a new item.
